metadata.summary: Create and structure lookups with support for multiple formats including MISP and OTX feeds, with optimized metadata handling for large-scale threat intelligence
metadata.primary_use_case: Build indicator lists from various threat intelligence sources for automated detection via D&R rules

extracted_apis.description: Upload lookup data via REST API (max 15MB)

cross_refs.description: Shows hive-based approach to managing lookups with IaC support
Lookups are stored in the Config Hive system
